title: KERNEL32.dll.
body: "The procedure entry point InitializaConditionVariable could not be located in the dynamic link library KERNEL32.dll." When im trying to join PBE this appears...am I alone? Help!

replies.body:
Does this notification also come with a bad image error?  You might have an anti-virus that's a bit overzealous and blocking league's dll files from being used.  You'll need to adjust your anti-virus settings to allow the entire Riot Games folder as an exception.

Once complete, you will have to [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) the game to clear up any improperly installed files and restore permissions.
